lead_paragraph: The actress, nominated for a Bafta as best actress for her role in “Arrival,” has been a knockout in Tom Ford’s designs this red carpet season.
snippet: The actress, nominated for a Bafta as best actress for her role in “Arrival,” has been a knockout in Tom Ford’s designs this red carpet season....

headline.main: For Amy Adams, Her Director Is Her Designer
headline.print_headline: When Your Director Is Your Designer
